name: English Chilean Mixed Mineral (Calcite & Proustite)
description: Over time with intense heat and pressure, new crystals form in the pockets of the earth's crust. Analogous to the crystal formation in the earth's mantle, mixed-race communities and diaspora in host countries exist in spaces between cultures. This existence is filled with the stresses of navigating multiple realities. In order to fit in and survive, individuals and communites have merged the diverse traditions, customs, rituals and habits of every day life to make a new blueprint on how to fit in and survive. More information at www.syberweerd.com
